formattedAddress: 12 Monroe St, New York, NY 10002, USA
adrFormatAddress: 12 Monroe St, New York, NY 10002, USA

originalText.text:
Dynasty Wedding

My real rating is 4.5 stars because of a few small mishaps, but overall I‚Äôd still round up to 5 stars.

Communicating with Chris Chen from start to finish was easy. I also liked how we had two zoom calls before the actual wedding day; I imagine if your timeline needed more work, he‚Äôd be flexible with having more than that.

The day of wedding was really great for the most part. There was a small mishap during our short impromptu Ceremony rehearsal. The DJ played the recessional song instead of the processional one. Well, at least that was during the rehearsal and not the actual ceremony! üò≥ I would not have been happy.

Also I think they had set up an elaborate mic stand for my Officiant for some reason. I told my cousin to make sure he moved it before we did our kiss (didnt want it in the pictures) but I think in the end my cousin just decided to do away with the stand all together and just held the mic. This was the right call on his part.

There was another small hiccup before the real ceremony where the right music wasnt being played again, though I think that may have been because the DJ wasnt given the cue that we were actually starting. I dont know. But it‚Äôs ok, no one but me and the wedding party noticed I think. üòì Otherwise, the ceremony ran very smoothly.

I have no complaints for the music throughout the night. They played my prepared playlist and played all the right music for my grand entrance, first dance, cake cutting, grand re-entrance, and my various tosses (bouquet, cat plushie and dog plushie). My people arent really dancers, but what little guests did go on the dance floor danced their hearts out and had a great time.

The MC they had for my day did a great job overall. I think most of my guests are not used to there being an MC for a wedding, let alone one who can fluently speak Cantonese and Mandarin. I was a little bit disappointed and miffed that she told me that she was more or less going to just do Mandarin and English though. I mean, I understand that doing three languages is hard on her and even the guests, but I feel like this should have been communicated more upfront before the event. Then at least I wouldnt have just said ‚Äúyes‚Äù because I was tired of making on-the-fly decisions all day üòìüòìüòì. Oh well. And the MC did keep asking me about things in the timeline through the evening‚Ä¶.I dont know if that‚Äôs normal or if maybe she just wanted some input in the whole thing? I dont know but I managed. As my husband said, maybe she was just offering suggestions? But sometimes it didnt feel like that to me, I felt pushed into not keeping true to my original plan.

But I would say overall, I was happy with the MC. The MC kept my guests entertained and she did a good job keeping the event on schedule. We ran a bit behind on time but that‚Äôs to be expected really. No one but me, who remembered the schedule religiously at this point, knew lol. My husband‚Äôs family were very pleased with her work as well. Also, she was great at getting women to get on the dance floor for the bouquet toss, because for some reason everyone was super shy for that. üòÇ I think by the time the cat plushie and dog plushie toss came around, the crowd was more into the idea and wholeheartedly participated.

To summarize, Dynasty Wedding did a great job for my wedding and I definitely would recommend them. There were just a few minor things that happened here and there. But that‚Äôs the nature of weddings I suppose. Learn to let some of the minor things go and just roll with the punches.

originalText.text:
We can‚Äôt thank Chris and the Dynasty Weddings team enough for making our wedding so fun and special. From the beginning Chris had excellent communication with us, we set up several zoom meetings with him and went over every detail we wanted as well as the timeline of events. He made the whole process easy and comfortable for us and made sure we got what we wanted.

The event itself was nothing short of amazing. The dynasty weddings team helped bring the energy to the crowd, there was not one second where the dance floor was empty. From beginning to end they had our wedding party dancing and the energy felt electric. Chris as the MC was great throughout the night, directing and hyping up our wild crowd of a wedding party that night. The Dj was on point throughout the whole night, again at no point in time the dance floor was empty.

Again we can‚Äôt thank Chris and Dynasty Weddings enough for making our wedding a night to remember for everyone. I cant recommend this team enough!

originalText.text:
Chris and his team at Dynasty Weddings helped my wife and I throw an incredibly fun wedding celebration! Both Chinese and non-Chinese folks got down and had a good time. We highly recommend hiring them!

They're pros and were able to anticipate all our Wedding day needs (good call on the photobooth!). The company provided top notch talent, including: a professional photographer that helped us take some incredible pre-wedding photos, a bilingual MC that helped move the evening along, and a DJ that got everybody dancing.

text.text:

They're pros and were able to anticipate all our Wedding day needs (good call on the photobooth!). The company provided top notch talent, including: a professional photographer that helped us take some incredible pre-wedding photos, a bilingual MC that helped move the evening along, and a DJ that got everybody dancing.

originalText.text:
Working with Chris and the Dynasty team was an absolute delight from day one! Chris's patience in addressing my myriad of questions before we even signed the agreement immediately put me at ease. His team's support and responsiveness continued throughout the entire wedding process.

The highlight of the evening was undoubtedly the phenomenal sound system that Dynasty provided. Our guests couldn't stop raving about it! Coco, a true gem, was there to guide me through anything I wasn't familiar with during the night, ensuring everything ran smoothly.

But what truly made our night unforgettable was the DJ's incredible playlist. As someone who believes music sets the tone, the DJ went above and beyond to curate the perfect atmosphere.

I want to extend my heartfelt thanks to the Dynasty team for making our evening so wonderful. Their flexibility, even with a busy weekend schedule, was truly appreciated. It was a night to remember, all thanks to this fantastic team!

originalText.text: Chris and his team provided dancing on the cloud, sparkler machine, 360 video booth, officiant, and DJ and MC services at our wedding. He also provides the bilingual MC service. Chris is super responsive is and he stayed late for us to go through wedding details over and over again. We will definitely recommend his team!!
